SENT.plain: Tissue P-glycoprotein immunostaining was performed in seventy one patients with follicular large, mixed, or small cell non-Hodgkin's lymphomas
Only six patients (8.5%) demonstrated positive immunostaining for P-glycoprotein
All patients had complete and durable responses to initial therapy
P-glycoprotein (MDR) fails to predict for primary drug resistance in follicular lymphomas and is constitutionally expressed in only a few follicular lymphomas at present
